feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023
